content: *perfect for halloween treats and more lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70462ad skill level easy level 2 lion® wool article #820 4 colors 158 yards each *winter white pumpkin goldenrod cocoa* *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * bag is worked in continuous rounds bag is finished by felting see also 70461ad felted black cat bag 1 *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-black-cat-bag
